attributes.action: Save the (Mv St Helen) 1893 Wightlink Ferry
attributes.additional_details:
Wightlink Ltd own a passenger ferry called
(Mv St Helen) I have been on it from the Isle of Wight to Portsmouth back and forward since I first moved to the Island. I am really disappointed about the status of the ferry this has to be saved and stopped as they have planned on sending it to the breakers to be sold as scrap metal. This ferry has always been my favourite. Please sign to save this as this ferry has gone through so many disasters in its life. Thank you!!!
